channel.title: Caligo-Realm 317 | FREE CLAWS | Fun Eco | Lucky Weapons | SOF | 24/7
channel.description:
[center]================================= Caligo-Realm 317 ================================
Visit Caligo-Realm website here : http://www.caligorealm.com/
- Caligo-Realm Features -
- No lag, 24-7. - Stable/fun economy! - 100% Money Pouch ! - First server ever to have lucky weaopns! - Fishing (with rocktail fishing) - Frost dragons - Revenants, Balance Elemental, Rammernaut, Bloodchillers & loads more ! - 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others. - Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc...) - 100% Dicing! (Clan Chat supported) - Summoning with all familiars - Newest/old hit marks (Can be toggled in the option interface) - Glacors + Steadfast, Glaiven and Ragefire boots - Custom slayer system - Full pest control - Abysall whip vine - PK points System, EP System, Member system! - Killstreak system - Lottery - Perfect Ancient Curses. - Korasi's sword - Slayer helm fully working - Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape - Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more. - Flasks - All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working. - Inferno Adze 100% - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Vote4Reward - Active Community with forums. - Regular double exp/drops weekend. - Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches. - Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat. - Regular community events & drop parties. - Crystal Key system - Shiny Key system - Bone key system - Nex armours - 2B Tickets
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LmZrcAF.png[/img]
[img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/9108/z86.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CdxKFJl.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Hd42KkU.png[/img]
[img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/6395/pef2.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YmSdtaa.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gld8OlN.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CLx25xw.png[/img]
[b]Play instantly :[/b] http://www.caligorealm.com/play.html[/center]
